property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: JDBC connect string for a JDBC metastore. To use SSL to encrypt/authenticate the connection, provide database-specific SSL flag in the connection URL. For example, jdbc:postgresql://s/db?ssl=true for postgres database.

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Driver class name for a JDBC metastore

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Username to use against metastore database

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: password to use against metastore database

property.name: metastore.try.direct.sql.ddl
property.description: Same as hive.metastore.try.direct.sql, for read statements within a transaction that modifies metastore data. Due to non-standard behavior in Postgres, if a direct SQL select query has incorrect syntax or something similar inside a transaction, the entire transaction will fail and fall-back to DataNucleus will not be possible. You should disable the usage of direct SQL inside transactions if that happens in your case.
